dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate word similarity, which reportedly fails to capture the degradation of vector quality as noise is added.

Marco Baroni
dcterms:description: A dataset used for multimodal distributional semantics, serving as a benchmark for evaluating semantic models.
dcterms:title: men

dcterms:creator: Herbert Rubenstein
John B. Goodenough
dcterms:description: A dataset that contains contextual correlates of synonymy, often used in studies of semantic similarity.
dcterms:title: Rubenstein and Goodenough

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides contextual correlates of semantic similarity, used to evaluate models of semantic understanding.
